biolockj

Class BioLockJ

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.BioLockJ

  • public class BioLockJ
extends Object
    This is the primary BioLockJ class - its main() method is executed when the jar is run.
    This class validates the runtime parameters to run a new pipeline or restart a failed pipeline.
    The Java log file is initialized and the configuration file is processed before starting the pipeline.
    If the pipeline is successful, the program executes clean up operations (if configured) and creates a status-complete indicator file in the pipeline root directory.

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
        BioLockJ is the BioLockj.jar Main-Class, so this main method is the first method executed when BioLockJ runs. The biolockj shell script always passed the project directory path $DOCKER_PROJ as 1st param.
        The program requires a single user-provided parameter, the path to a Config file.
        If -r switch is passed, attempt to restart a filed pipeline.
        If -d switch is passed, run direct pipeline for given Java module.
        An optional parameter can be used to set the encrypted email password or as the direct pipelines Java class.
        Execution summary:
        1. Call RuntimeParamUtil.registerRuntimeParameters(String[]) to validate runtime parameters
        2. Call Config.initialize(File) to load project properties
        3. Call MetaUtil.initialize() to verify metadata dependencies
        4. Copy Config file and nested "project.defaultProps" files into "internal.pipelineDir" to preserve the state of these files at runtime.
        5. Initialize Log using /resources/log4J.properties
        6. If "project.copyInput" = "Y", copy input files into a new "input" directory under "internal.pipelineDir"
        7. Call SeqUtil.initialize() to set Config parameters based on sequence files
        8. Call Pipeline.initializePipeline() to initialize Pipeline modules
        9. Call Pipeline.runPipeline() or Pipeline.runDirectModule(String) to execute pipeline modules.
        10. Call removeTempFiles() to complete clean up operation, and if Config."project.deleteTempFiles" = "Y", delete temp directories
        11. Call markProjectStatus(String) to set the overall pipeline status

        If pipeline has failed, attempt execute Email (if configured) to notify user of failures.

        Parameters:
        args - - String[] runtime parameters passed to the Java program when launching BioLockJ

      • createPipelineDirectory

        protected static File createPipelineDirectory()
                                       throws Exception
        Create the pipeline root directory under $DOCKER_PROJ and save the path to Config."internal.pipelineDir".

        For example, the following Config settings will create: /projects/MicrobeProj_2018Jan01

        • $DOCKER_PROJ = /projects
        • Config file name = MicrobeProj.properties
        • Current date = January 1, 2018
        Returns:
        Pipeline root directory
        Throws:
        Exception - if projectDir already exists and optionalParam != restart

      • getRestartDir

        protected static File getRestartDir()
                             throws Exception
        Method called if restart flag passed to BioLockJ to look in $DOCKER_PROJ for the most recent pipeline sharing the same project name. Delete status indicator if "biolockjFailed" found in root directory.
        Returns:
        File - the existing pipeline root directory to restart
        Throws:
        Exception - thrown if the most recent pipeline with the same project name is not found or ran successfully

      • markProjectStatus

        protected static void markProjectStatus(String status)
        Create indicator file in pipeline root directory, with name = status parameter. Config."internal.pipelineDir".
        Parameters:
        status - Status indicator file name

      • removeTempFiles

        protected static void removeTempFiles()
                               throws Exception
        Delete all BioModule/"temp" folders.
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to delete temp files
